DOC.brief_summary: Recently , inactivated vaccine ( vero cell ) EV71 investigate Phase 1 Phase 2 clinical trial . Data trial show EV71 vaccine good safety profile immunogenic . 320 U alum-adjuvant vaccine choose candidate vaccine phase 3 clinical trial . This clinical trial supplementary phase 2 trial , design study gene expression pattern induce EV71 vaccine Chinese healthy child age 2 5 year old use system biology approach combine microarray analysis，RT-PCR neutralizing antibody test PBMC serum collect form study child population , predict immunogenicity , explore mechanistic insight EV71 vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Systems Biology Vaccination EV71 Vaccine Humans
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject age 2 5 year old establish medical history clinical examination The prevaccination neutralize antibody EV71 < 1:8 determined ELISA The subject ' guardian able understand sign inform consent Had never receive vaccine EV71 Subjects comply requirement protocol Subjects temperature ＜37.1°C axillary setting Subject medical history HFMD < = 37 week gestation Subjects birth weight < 2.5 kg Subject medical history following : allergic history , allergic ingredient vaccine Family history seizure progressive neurological disease Family history congenital hereditary immunodeficiency Severe malnutrition dysgenopathy Major congenital defect serious chronic illness , include perinatal brain damage Autoimmune disease Bleeding disorder diagnose doctor significant bruising bleed difficulty IM injection blood draw Any acute infection last 7 day Any prior administration immunodepressant corticosteroid last 6month Any prior administration blood product last 3 month Any prior administration research medicine last 1month Any prior administration attenuate live vaccine last 28 day Any prior administration inactivate vaccine last 14 day , pneumococcal vaccine Under anti TB prevention therapy Any condition opinion investigator , may interfere evaluation study objective
